title: Druid Spells
content: Range: 1.5m The berries appear in the targeted creature's inventory and disappear after a long rest. Healing Word Lv 1 Evocation Bonus Action 1d4+[Spellcasting Modifier] hit pointsA creature you can see regains 1d4+[Spellcasting Modifier] hit points.This spell has no effect on Undead or Constructs. Range: 18m/60ft Jump Lv 1 Transmutation Action Inflicts Jump (10)Touch a creature to triple its jumping distance.
